mods.abstract: Female adult, China shoulder head, cloth body with leather arms and cloth legs, molded and painted features and black hair, white linen and cotton underskirt trimmed with open lace work, vertical tucks, and lace, yellowish-brown floral jacket has wide lace collar, bodice lined with linen, four little buttons, pointed waist, full length gathering skirt, ruffle trimmed hem, brown knit fabric for boots, boots decorated with golden thread, resembles shoe strings. Golden necklace, brooch on front neck. Accompanying information describes that the doll was made in the 1860s. The clothes and jewelry are the original ones, the doll was purchased from an old woman who had been in the circus all her life. Doll body and underwear are machine and hand-made. Dress is hand-made.""
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
